price: Allahu, me fjalën e Tij e forcon të Vërtetën, edhe sikur ta urrejnë keqbërësit këtë!”
arabic: وَيُحِقُّ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِكَلِمَٰتِهِۦ وَلَوۡ كَرِهَ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wayuḥiqqu al-lahu al-ḥaqa bikalimātihi walaw kariha al-muj'rimūna
